description: The Blobeye STI. Rally DNA in a sedan you could daily drive to work — if work was a special stage in Finland. The EJ257 boxer turbo four delivers its power with a distinctive rumble that you can hear three blocks away, and the symmetrical AWD system puts every bit of it to the ground.
lore: World Rally Blue with gold wheels. If you know, you know. The STI is the working-class hero of the tuner world — affordable enough to buy, capable enough to win, and loud enough to announce your arrival at every meet in Nova Pacifica.
